statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 5 \\ -4 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -9 \\ 10 \\ 20 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 28 \\ -8 \\ 4 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 5 \\ -4 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -9 \\ 10 \\ 20 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 28 \\ -8 \\ 4 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
